testcase.name: Verify Playlists. User should be able to create, get and update a playlist
testcase.system-out: When With request headers...................................................passed And With request body: "src/test/resources/test-data/CreatePlaylists.json"..passed When User makes a POST request to endpoint: "users/{{user_id}}/playlists"...passed Then Response status code should be: 201....................................passed And Response body should contains fields....................................passed And Store response body value in variable...................................passed When User makes a GET request to endpoint: "playlists/{playlist_id_from_post_request}".passed Then Response status code should be: 200....................................passed When User makes a PUT request to endpoint: "playlists/{playlist_id_from_post_request}".passed
